notes.body: The free concentration of PI3K inhibitor in the blood, in ng/ml.
The total concentration, bound + unbound, of PI3K inhibitor in the blood, in ng/ml
Sasaki 2000: In PI3Kgamma KO mice, reduced activation of mature T cells.
Patton 2006: PI3Kdelta regulates suppression of Th cells by Tregs. Suggests that Tregs are not fully "activated" to do their suppressive job. IL-10 secretion is also impaired.
